name: Biased means
description: Faces were extracted from the painting collection of the Rijksmuseum, separated between left and right gazing, and then averaged. The animation fades back and forth between these two means. —- Interaction: After clicking, the gaze follows horizontal mouse movement. —- Background: https://doi.org/10.1163/22134913-bja10022 —- Dates: paper published in March 2021, discovered a few years earlier, p5 animation created and minted in May 2021.
